TEXT.TITLE: ALASKA AIR GROUP <ALK> TO OFFER STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Alaska Air Group Inc said it will offer 1.8 mln shares of common stock at 25.875 dlrs per share. The company said proceeds from the 45.1-mln-dlr offering will be used to reduce debt, for working capital and for capital expenditures. Reuter
